text: Ferdinand Amadi (born 18 September 1970) is an athlete from the Central African Republic. He represented his country at the 1992 Summer Olympics.Ferdinand Amadi at sports-reference.com ==Achievements== *All results regarding marathon, unless stated otherwise {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing |- |1992 |Olympic Games |Barcelona, Spain |74th |2:35:39 |} ==References== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Central African Republic male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of the Central African Republic Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Central African Republic male marathon runners
